column4: make sure your lspci database is up-to-date       http://pciids.sourceforge.net/pci.ids <--- getting that file might help you identify what type of webcam you have and allow you to google for more and better results on getting it work
what's the output of          /sbin/lspci        ? --- might have to pastebin that
